question: Pedro shook a can of soda. When the soda was opened, foam and soda burst from the can. Which statement best explains what happened?
candidate_answers: (A) A new substance was formed. (B) The gas pressure was released from the can. (C) The sugar in the soda turned into a gas. (D) The can absorbed heat from the air.
answer: The gas pressure was released from the can.
label: B
